titleStmt.title: The scrivener's guide being choice and approved forms of presidents of all sorts of business now in use and practice, in a much better method than any yet printed, being useful for all gentlemen, but chiefly for those who practice the law, viz. assignments, articles of agreement, acquittances, bargains and sale, bills, conditions, copartnerships, covenants, deeds, defeazances, grants, joyntures, indentures, letters of attorny, licenses, obligations, provisoes, presidents for parish business, releases, revocations, wills, warrants of attorny, &c. / by Nicholas Cobert ...
titleStmt.author: Covert, Nicholas.
Bohun, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of Richard and Edward Atkins ... for Charles Harper ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
